title: Magazine font ID help
content:
I recently saw this text in a magazine and can't believe it's a typeface. The C's! I have to know what this is. Please help!?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [smithsonian type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414023730/http:/typophile.com/files/smithsonian%20type.jpg) | 161.91 KB |
author: catwyatt

comments.content: Amazing! I see they have a text version as well. All good to know. Thank you!!
